column2: "You there. Sorry to bother you, but can you help us? Ask the woman next to me for more details."
"Why do children passing by keep asking us for gifts when they see us? Is it because of our outfits...?"
"Well, I certainly don't mind seeing such big smiles on those children's faces."

"I see, so the idea is to wait until your children or partner have fallen asleep, then leave presents for them...
What a strange tradition."

"Aha, and this \"Santa\" is typically depicted as an old man with a large white beard.
...Hm?"

"For some reason, I feel like I know someone who meets that description already...
It must be my imagination."
"Hm? Am I not cold in this outfit? Indeed, my shoulders are a little too exposed for cold weather..."

"But the feeling I get from watching these crowds of people...
That is warmth enough for me."
"It seems that whatever feeling was driving me has melted away in the hustle and bustle of this beautiful city."

"I'm... just like the original, you say?
...You mean I'm like Santa?"

"...Merry Christmas.
Hmm, now how should I go about getting my revenge...
I'll have to think about this."
